text: Madeleine Juneau (10 November 1945 - 26 June 2020) was a Canadian museologist and teacher. She was a member of the Congregation of Notre Dame of Montreal. She was awarded the Prix GÃ©rard-Morisset in 2013. She was born in Saint- Augustin-de-Desmaures, Quebec. Juneau died in Verdun, France on 26 June 2020, aged 74. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Canadian historians Category:Canadian educators Category:Writers from Montreal
title: Madeleine Juneau
